name: VR room (with tracker support)
description:
Simple vr enivornment i made for a school project.

!If the hand model doesn't get attached to the tracker when the game begins press buttons 1 t/m 5 on your keyboard until the hand model is attached to the model!

Some models were downloaded from Sketchfab. links:

-https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/low-poly-hand-468f15b8790249c88c3da69af08facfe

-https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/dodo-264b7746a42b41b2845a499de16f8538

-https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/hoa-hakananaia-752e69d34933438d8230ac829d22300e

-https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/stone-figure-of-xiuhcoatl-fire-serpent-eb247f805...
